si.title: Police Sub-Inspector arrested for soliciting bribe
body_lines: කෝම්පන්නවිදියා පොලිස් ස්ථානයට අනුයුක්තව රු.. 100,000 කි.

ta.title: லஞ்சம் கோரியதற்காக போலீஸ் துணை ஆய்வாளர் கைது செய்யப்பட்டார்
body_lines: A Sub-Inspector attached to the Kompannavidiya Police Station was arrested by officers of the Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption (CIABOC) near the Fort Magistrate’s Court premises for allegedly soliciting a bribe of Rs. 100,000.
